item.title: Coding period phase 1 part 1
item.description: Community Bonding period ended on 31st may, I covered my experience with PySAL community during CB period in my last blog. Coding period has already started in the beginning of this month and We’ve reached mid way of the first phase. Through this blog I’ll share what all I’ve been working on during these couple of weeks. What I did before coding period As stated in the last blog, during community bonding period my focus was to grow my understanding of libpysal's structure, code base and API design paradigms.
